segments.text: I'm just calling to see if you have made any decision about the position .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry , we haven't made the decision at all .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have any idea when you might arrive at a decision ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We will let you know probably next Monday . I hope to give you a positive reply .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm willing to wait until you have come to a decision .
segments.speaker: S1
